# gal-bullet

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                   | Type                                                                                    | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`   | `color`   | Color theme based on semantic tokens                          | `"almond" \| "error" \| "grey" \| "info" \| "pink" \| "sage" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'sage'`    |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size of the bullet: xsmall (6px), small (10px), medium (18px) | `"medium" \| "small" \| "xsmall"`                                                       | `'small'`   |
| `variant` | `variant` | Variant: filled (primary) or light (secondary)                | `"primary" \| "secondary"`                                                              | `'primary'` |
